Title: Requires the governor to publicize the criteria used when granting a commutation, pardon or reprieve
Summary: Relates to requiring the governor to publicize the criteria used when granting a commutation, pardon or reprieve; requires disclosure of information related to such commutations, pardons or reprieves within 30 days instead of annually.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 4 of article 4 of the constitution, in relation to requiring the governor to publicize the criteria used when granting a commutation, pardon or reprieve
